original_text: Nebuchadnezzar had an officer who was called Ashpenaz. Ashpenaz had authority over the king's other officers. One day, Nebuchadnezzar said to Ashpenaz, ‘Bring some of the Israelite men to me. Choose some men from the king of Judah's family, and choose some men from the other important Israelite families.’
korean_text: 왕이 환관장 아스부나스에게 말하여 이스라엘 자손 중에서 왕족과 귀족 몇 사람

sentences.original_text: Ashpenaz had authority over the king's other officers
One day, Nebuchadnezzar said to Ashpenaz
'Bring some of the Israelite men to me
sentences.korean_translation: '이스라엘 사람들 중 몇 사람을 나에게 데려오너라'

sentences.original_text: Choose some men from the king of Judah's family
sentences.korean_translation: 유다 왕의 가족 중에서 몇 사람을 선택하고

sentences.original_text: and choose some men from the other important Israelite families'
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 중요한 이스라엘 가문에서도 몇 사람을 선택하라'
